misc: Rarely seen on the course without a drink in his hand
biography: Martin, a familiar face at St. Laurence Golf, is known for his relaxed demeanor and the ever-present drink in his hand, a testament to his belief in enjoying the game above all else. Do not mistake his laid-back approach for a lack of competitive spirit, however. Martin is a force to be reckoned with when he sets his mind to it.

With nine past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Martin brings a wealth of experience to the greens. His dedication and skill have translated into tangible success, as he has secured the coveted Hector Trophée once, in addition to one Victor Trophy.

As he prepares for his tenth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, Martin remains an active and respected figure in the tournament. His blend of skill, experience, and unwavering enjoyment of the game makes him a compelling player to watch.
